Nunu"},{"lineNumber":129175,"originalJapaneseLine":"二人は肯き、古く、巨大な扉を開いた。","translatedEnglishLine":"The two nodded and opened the old, massive door."},{"lineNumber":129176,"originalJapaneseLine":"宇宙船内――","translatedEnglishLine":"Inside the spaceship—"},{"lineNumber":129177,"originalJapaneseLine":"コールドスリープ室――","translatedEnglishLine":"Cold Sleep Chamber—"},{"lineNumber":129178,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、はぁ〜〜〜……","translatedEnglishLine":"Hah, haaah~..."},{"lineNumber":129179,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こりゃ、すごいだすなぁ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"This is really something amazing..."},{"lineNumber":129180,"originalJapaneseLine":"異様に広い室内には、","translatedEnglishLine":"Inside the unusually large room,"},{"lineNumber":129181,"originalJapaneseLine":"コールドスリープ装置が規則正しく","translatedEnglishLine":"cold sleep devices were arranged in an orderly fashion,"},{"lineNumber":129182,"originalJapaneseLine":"おびただしい程の数が並んでいた。","translatedEnglishLine":"numbering an incredible amount."},{"lineNumber":129183,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この中で沢山の異星人さん達が眠っているなんて、","translatedEnglishLine":"It's strange to think that many aliens are sleeping in here..."},{"lineNumber":129184,"originalJapaneseLine":"　不思議ですねぇ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's really mysterious..."},{"lineNumber":129185,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そーーーんなもんはどうでもいい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't care about that at all!"},{"lineNumber":129186,"originalJapaneseLine":"「で、どこだどこだ、","translatedEnglishLine":"So, where is it, where is it,"},{"lineNumber":129187,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺様のセラクロラスはどこにいる？」","translatedEnglishLine":"where is my Seracloras?"},{"lineNumber":129188,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、ランス様、あそこで誰か倒れていますよ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, Lord Rance, someone is collapsed over there!?"},{"lineNumber":129189,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おおっ！　あれがセラクロ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh! sleeping."},{"lineNumber":129206,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はっ、そうか、分かったぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, I see, I understand Eye."},{"lineNumber":129208,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐふふ、それならしばらく待てばナイスバディに……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Gufufu, if that's the case, if we wait a bit, she'll have a nice body..."},{"lineNumber":129209,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ならないわよ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"That won't happen, you know?"},{"lineNumber":129210,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Huh?"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: せめてよく説明して納得してもらってから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the very least, we should explain thoroughly and get their understanding first.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 開けてもらった方が良かろう……ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It'd be better to have it opened after they're convinced... Nunu

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん？　どうするか決まったか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm? Have you decided what to do?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ランス殿、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Lord Rance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここは我らにとって本当に大事な部屋。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is truly an important room for us.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 儂の言うことをよく聞いて頂きたい。ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want you to listen carefully to what I say. Nunu

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そして、儂の出す条件を守って頂きたい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And I want you to follow the conditions I set.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それなら、この扉を開けましょう。ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If so, we will open this door. Nunu

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、最初からそういう態度でいればいいのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmph, you should have had that attitude from the start.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、話くらいは聞いてやろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, I'll at least listen to you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「先程メガワスから聞きましたな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I just heard from Megawas.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 多くの仲間達が今も尚、眠っておると。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Many comrades are still sleeping now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その場所がこのコールドスリープ室じゃ。ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That place is this cold sleep chamber. Nunu

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「多くの同胞がここで眠りについておる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Many of our brethren are sleeping here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だからお願いじゃ、余計なものには
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So I beg of you, please don't touch anything unnecessary.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 絶対に触れんで欲しい。ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Absolutely do not touch anything. Nunu

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「条件とはそれだけです。ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those are the only conditions. Nunu

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「良かろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Very well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ムシなんぞ興味ないしな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm not interested in bugs anyway.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「約束ですぞ。ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a promise. Nunu

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メガッスは扉に向き直り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Megass turned to face the door,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メガフォースとメガワスに視線で指示を送る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and gave a glance to Megaforce and Megawas, signaling instructions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………むう。ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm... Nunu

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、仕方ないわね。ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, it can't be helped. Nunu

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人は肯き、古く、巨大な扉を開いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The two nodded and opened the old, massive door.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 宇宙船内――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inside the spaceship—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コールドスリープ室――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cold Sleep Chamber—
Hah, haaah~...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こりゃ、すごいだすなぁ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is really something amazing...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 異様に広い室内には、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inside the unusually large room,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コールドスリープ装置が規則正しく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: cold sleep devices were arranged in an orderly fashion,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おびただしい程の数が並んでいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: numbering an incredible amount.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この中で沢山の異星人さん達が眠っているなんて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's strange to think that many aliens are sleeping in here...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 不思議ですねぇ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's really mysterious...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そーーーんなもんはどうでもいい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't care about that at all!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「で、どこだどこだ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, where is it, where is it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様のセラクロラスはどこにいる？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: where is my Seracloras?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、ランス様、あそこで誰か倒れていますよ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, Lord Rance, someone is collapsed over there!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おおっ！　あれがセラクロ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh! That's Sera-clo...
...loras?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 床にまるで行き倒れのように一人の少女がグウグウと眠っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the floor, a girl was sleeping soundly, almost like she had collapsed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだ、この小っこい生命体は……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What is this tiny life form...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それこそ、ランス君が探し求めていた、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That is exactly one of the holy maiden child monsters Lord Rance has been searching for,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聖女の子モンスターの一人、時のセラクロラスよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the holy maiden monster, Seracloras of Time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはセラクロラスの服（？）に手を伸ばし、引っ張る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance reached out to Seracloras' clothes(?) and pulled.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜グイッ＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <Grab>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ら、ランス様、駄目ですよ、そんなこと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: L-Lord Rance, you can't do that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「小っこい……めっちゃ小っこい……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So small... really small...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様の入らない……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't get inside...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐー、すぴー……ひょろろー……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zzz, snooze... hyororo...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あられもない姿を晒していることにも気づかず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unaware of her exposing an indecent figure,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セラクロラスはすやすやと眠っている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seracloras was peacefully sleeping.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっ、そうか、分かったぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, I see, I understand now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こいつもベゼルアイと同じく、力を使い切った状態か」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This one is also in the state of having used up all her power, just like Bezel Eye.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐふふ、それならしばらく待てばナイスバディに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gufufu, if that's the case, if we wait a bit, she'll have a nice body...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ならないわよ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That won't happen, you know?
Huh?

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: せめてよく説明して納得してもらってから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the very least, we should explain thoroughly and get their understanding first.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 開けてもらった方が良かろう……ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It'd be better to have it opened after they're convinced... Nunu

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん？　どうするか決まったか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm? Have you decided what to do?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ランス殿、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Lord Rance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここは我らにとって本当に大事な部屋。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is truly an important room for us.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 儂の言うことをよく聞いて頂きたい。ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want you to listen carefully to what I say. Nunu

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そして、儂の出す条件を守って頂きたい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And I want you to follow the conditions I set.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それなら、この扉を開けましょう。ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If so, we will open this door. Nunu

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、最初からそういう態度でいればいいのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmph, you should have had that attitude from the start.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、話くらいは聞いてやろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, I'll at least listen to you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「先程メガワスから聞きましたな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I just heard from Megawas.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 多くの仲間達が今も尚、眠っておると。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Many comrades are still sleeping now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その場所がこのコールドスリープ室じゃ。ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That place is this cold sleep chamber. Nunu

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「多くの同胞がここで眠りについておる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Many of our brethren are sleeping here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だからお願いじゃ、余計なものには
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So I beg of you, please don't touch anything unnecessary.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 絶対に触れんで欲しい。ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Absolutely do not touch anything. Nunu

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「条件とはそれだけです。ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those are the only conditions. Nunu

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「良かろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Very well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ムシなんぞ興味ないしな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm not interested in bugs anyway.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「約束ですぞ。ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a promise. Nunu

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メガッスは扉に向き直り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Megass turned to face the door,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メガフォースとメガワスに視線で指示を送る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and gave a glance to Megaforce and Megawas, signaling instructions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………むう。ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm... Nunu

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、仕方ないわね。ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, it can't be helped. Nunu

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人は肯き、古く、巨大な扉を開いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The two nodded and opened the old, massive door.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 宇宙船内――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inside the spaceship—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コールドスリープ室――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cold Sleep Chamber—
Hah, haaah~...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こりゃ、すごいだすなぁ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is really something amazing...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 異様に広い室内には、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inside the unusually large room,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コールドスリープ装置が規則正しく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: cold sleep devices were arranged in an orderly fashion,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おびただしい程の数が並んでいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: numbering an incredible amount.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この中で沢山の異星人さん達が眠っているなんて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's strange to think that many aliens are sleeping in here...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 不思議ですねぇ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's really mysterious...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そーーーんなもんはどうでもいい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't care about that at all!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「で、どこだどこだ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, where is it, where is it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様のセラクロラスはどこにいる？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: where is my Seracloras?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、ランス様、あそこで誰か倒れていますよ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, Lord Rance, someone is collapsed over there!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おおっ！　あれがセラクロ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh! That's Sera-clo...
...loras?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 床にまるで行き倒れのように一人の少女がグウグウと眠っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the floor, a girl was sleeping soundly, almost like she had collapsed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだ、この小っこい生命体は……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What is this tiny life form...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それこそ、ランス君が探し求めていた、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That is exactly one of the holy maiden child monsters Lord Rance has been searching for,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聖女の子モンスターの一人、時のセラクロラスよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the holy maiden monster, Seracloras of Time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはセラクロラスの服（？）に手を伸ばし、引っ張る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance reached out to Seracloras' clothes(?) and pulled.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜グイッ＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <Grab>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ら、ランス様、駄目ですよ、そんなこと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: L-Lord Rance, you can't do that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「小っこい……めっちゃ小っこい……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So small... really small...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様の入らない……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't get inside...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐー、すぴー……ひょろろー……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zzz, snooze... hyororo...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あられもない姿を晒していることにも気づかず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unaware of her exposing an indecent figure,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セラクロラスはすやすやと眠っている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seracloras was peacefully sleeping.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっ、そうか、分かったぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, I see, I understand now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こいつもベゼルアイと同じく、力を使い切った状態か」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This one is also in the state of having used up all her power, just like Bezel Eye.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐふふ、それならしばらく待てばナイスバディに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gufufu, if that's the case, if we wait a bit, she'll have a nice body...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ならないわよ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That won't happen, you know?
Huh?
